title: Down to Earth: An astronomy education programme for Wales
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: This is a public engagement project so 'findings' /outcomes have been used as outlined in objectives Education,Other
findingsText: This was a public engagement project. The objectives set were delivered within the project to produce meteorite loan collection boxes in bilingual format for loan to Welsh school pupils and informal educational groups. These complement the impact calculator and are supported by learning resources. By rolling this programme out to other centres, particularly those that may need to work in a bilingual environment. Education,Other
